About Me

Tushar Khandelwal

I am Tushar and I love working with teams to create meaningful products. I love identyfying the user pains, come-up with counter measures and design solutions. I like making working prototypes based on the designs using latest technology. When not up to my elbows on the Web,I like meditating and doing yoga.

My Career

The MathWorks

Extensively researched a product feature and presented to the design and development team to get clarity on the details. This feature is coming up in the next release. Created dashboards for my team for metrics and analysis purpose.
